summary: This mod can help u check  NPCs\' race.....
descriptionHtml:
*****************Description******************
This mod can help u check  NPCs\' race.....

****************************************************
step1 : press console (~), select needed ped via left mouse button, close console.
step2: press \"F2\" button on your keyboard to activate or inactivate this mod 

       

******************Installation******************


1. Script Dragon files are included in my files already.

2. Or you can Install Script Dragon from the below link
  http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1292671-rel-script-dragon/page__st__20

3. Place racecheck.asi and racecheck.ini along with the other two files into your root Skyrim folder, alongside TESV.exe. Not the Data folder.

******************Uninstalling******************
Delete racecheck.asi and racecheck.ini

******************Credit******************
Thanks to Alexander Blade for Script Dragon.
author: Andy Stark
